diff_hunk:
@@ -1,12 +1,25 @@
 # frozen_string_literal: true
 module NavHelper
-  SOC_CONTROLLER = %w(conferences projects applications application_drafts teams users)
+  SOC_CONTROLLER = %w(conferences projects applications application_drafts teams community).freeze
body:
The reason why I used this prefix: the menu / nav item this is about has the name `Summer of Code`, plus it's basically a global constant 😉 

So I would go for the plural version, yes, but I would keep some prefix to have it still closely tied to the menu item.
body_html:

body_text:

So I would go for the plural version, yes, but I would keep some prefix to have it still closely tied to the menu item.
